text:
Alright, alright! Apparently, the shop we're
going to today is famous for its parfaits!
We can each order whatever we like!

So! Before we get to the shop,
I'd like to decide on the menu!

Each parfait has a different motif, right?
I heard the fairy tale series is popular.
Even if we're going to choose, I'd like to see some pictures...

......It seems like we can view the menu on our phones,
so how about sitting on a bench in the park to check it out?

Yeah, that sounds good.
I want to take my time to think about it.

Hehe.
I'm looking forward to seeing the menu...

Hey!
So, our goal is the "park"! Let's go!
